P-4 P422 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R32) 1994 JGTC Series GT1 Class 13th/18th Place A. Iida/E. Yamada



Akira Iida & Eiji Yamada drove the #10 Johnson Was Nissan Skyline for the Nismo team in the 1994 JGTC Series. Their best result was a 5th place finish in round 2. Iida & Yamada finished the season in 13th & 18th place respectively. For something different, check out the Lancia 037 that raced in round 3 at the link where I found the photo of this car.

As for the model I didnâ€™t realize the roof aerial was missing until editing the photos of the model. :(
